3. Publish Menu¶

This menu allows for the control of other viewers, the publication of content and the publication of parameters to Rhino sessions that have subscribed to this specific viewer.

  1. Published content

  • controls the type of content that is published with this viewer

  1. Publish control

Control

This viewer’s settings are forced on all other viewers

Follow

viewers on the channel are forced to follow this viewer’s movement

Merge

control and follow in one button

Note: to Publish control, the active viewer has to be a member auf the channel

  1. Parameters

Send parameters back to Rhino Grasshopper that can be received with Subscribe Parameter

Add by typing a name and then click

Boolean (on/off)

Slider (Number between 0 and 1)

Integer (0,1,2, …)

Video tutorial:

  • Parameters

  • Voice chat and viewer to viewer control
